description: Upgrade your mobile storage with the Patriot Stellar USB 3.0 and USB OTG (on-the-go) compatible flash drive. The Stellar is equipped with a full sized USB 3.0 and Micro USB connector for compatibility with laptops and Android based tablets or smartphones. The Stellar offers the enhanced transfer speed of USB 3.0 when plugged into a PC or laptop.The Patriot Stellar is protected by a durable aluminum housing, offering best in class protection from the elements and heavy mobile use. Available in 16GB, 32GB, and 64GB capacities, the Stellar is plug-and-play compatible making it perfect for those who demand no hassle performance when it counts.The Stellar is compatible with Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows ME, Linux 2.4 and later, Mac OS9, X and later. Backed by Patriot Memory's award winning customer service, the Stellar comes with a 2-year warranty. USB 3.0 / Connector for PC/Mac Micro USB connector for Android - based smartphones / tablets 16GB USB 3.0: Up to 80MB/S transfer 32GB - 64GB USB 3.0: Up to 140MB/s transfer Driveless support for most operating system Compatible with Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows ME, Linux 2.4 and later, Mac OS9, X and later Portable and light weight (3 grams)
title: Patriot Stellar Series 16GB USB 3.0 OTG With Up To 80MB/s Transfer For Android Base Tablet/ Smartphone- PSF16GSTROTG
